exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : nat Hx : x <> 0 H : forall p : nat, prime p -> p <d x -> p <d y -> False Unable to unify "x" with "1".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment x, y : nat Hx : x <> 0 H : forall p : nat, prime p -> p <d x -> p <d y -> False Unable to unify "y" with "1".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment x, y : nat Hx : x <> 0 H : forall p : nat, prime p -> p <d x -> p <d y -> False k : nat H1 : k <d x H2 : k <d y Hk : k <> 1 The term "x" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "prime ?p".

exceptions.tactic: now apply divides_trans with (k := k) in H1.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

In environment H4 : forall x y z : nat, x <d y -> y <d z -> x <d z H2 : forall x : nat, x <d x H1 : forall p q : nat, prime p -> is_gcd p q 1 \\/ p <d q k, x1 : nat Hx : x1 * k = 0 -> False x0 : nat H : forall p : nat, prime p -> p <d x1 * k -> p <d x0 * k -> False Hk : k = 1 -> False Unable to unify "is_gcd ?M2941 ?M2942 1 \\/ ?M2941 <d ?M2942" with "exists p : nat, x1 * k = p * k".
No such bound variable k (possible names are: x, y and z).

original: intro Hx. intro H. split. - apply divides_refl. - split. + apply divides_refl. + intros k H1 H2. destruct (Nat.eq_dec k 1) as [Hk | Hk]. * rewrite Hk. apply divides_refl. * specialize (prime_gcd k x) as [Hgcd | Hpx]. -- now apply divides_trans with (k := k) in H1. -- exfalso. apply (H k). ++ auto. ++ apply H1. ++ apply divides_trans with (k := k). auto. auto.
